experience.title: Executive Director - Investment Banking
experience.description: Mergers & Acquisitions Sell-side and Buy-side, Private Equity, Debt Advisory and International Business Development Advisory in various geographies and industries.① Deal Origination and Execution: ▪Originated, negotiated, and executed corporate finance transactions, including buy-side target acquisition mandates, sell-side mandates, and strategic joint ventures in Europe and the GCC.  ▪Advised clients on raising debt and equity from institutional investors, private credit, and private equity funds to fuel their strategic growth plans and refinance existing assets.  ② Business Development: ▪Led the expansion of the firm by growing its network of corporate and institutional clients and partners, fostering strategic partnerships for mutual growth. ▪Developed an extensive client network focused on the GCC and Europe, spanning corporates, financial institutions, and institutional investors.  ▪Facilitated access for European corporations and institutions to GCC private and government sector stakeholders. ③ Leadership and Team Management: ▪Directed internal deal execution teams, and managed and supported external M&A execution teams of clients including their external counsel, in the preparation of transaction materials and documentation.④Sector and Geographical Coverage: ▪Covered various geographic regions, including the UK, Poland, Italy, United Arab Emirates, and Saudi Arabia under the broader European and Gulf Cooperation Council areas. ▪Focused sectors include Healthcare, Logistics, Real Estate, eCommerce and Renewable Energy.
experience.description_html: Mergers & Acquisitions Sell-side and Buy-side, Private Equity, Debt Advisory and International Business Development Advisory in various geographies and industries.① Deal Origination and Execution: ▪Originated, negotiated, and executed corporate finance transactions, including buy-side target acquisition mandates, sell-side mandates, and strategic joint ventures in Europe and the GCC. ▪Advised clients on raising debt and equity from institutional investors, private credit, and private equity funds to fuel their strategic growth plans and refinance existing assets.  ② Business Development: ▪Led the expansion of the firm by growing its network of corporate and institutional clients and partners, fostering strategic partnerships for mutual growth. ▪Developed an extensive client network focused on the GCC and Europe, spanning corporates, financial institutions, and institutional investors. ▪Facilitated access for European corporations and institutions to GCC private and government sector stakeholders. ③ Leadership and Team Management: ▪Directed internal deal execution teams, and managed and supported external M&A execution teams of clients including their external counsel, in the preparation of transaction materials and documentation.④Sector and Geographical Coverage: ▪Covered various geographic regions, including the UK, Poland, Italy, United Arab Emirates, and Saudi Arabia under the broader European and Gulf Cooperation Council areas. ▪Focused sectors include Healthcare, Logistics, Real Estate, eCommerce and Renewable Energy.
